titleStmt.title: A treatise of effectual calling and election In XVI. sermons, on 2 Peter 1.10. Wherein a Christian may discern, whether yet he be effectually called and elected. And what course he ought to take that he may attain the assurance thereof. Preached by that faithfull servant of Christ, Mr. Christopher Love, late minister of Laurence Jury, London.
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

titleStmt.title: A treatise of effectual calling and election In XVI. sermons, on 2 Peter 1.10. Wherein a Christian may discern, whether yet he be effectually called and elected. And what course he ought to take that he may attain the assurance thereof. Preached by that faithfull servant of Christ, Mr. Christopher Love, late minister of Laurence Jury, London.
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.
Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Rothwell at the Fountain and Beare in Goldsmiths Row in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Editors' note "To the reader" signed: Edmund Calamy [and four others].
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
